translation.Message_0_Page_0: Get out of here before <color=epic>Doctor Pluto</color> feeds you to his "pets."
translation.Message_1_Page_0: Don't let <color=epic>Doctor Pluto</color>'s ramblings get to you, he's a genius but I have begun questioning his sanity.
translation.Message_2_Page_0: Don't let <color=epic>Doctor Pluto</color> and I have been at this for far too long... Why doesn't anything work?!
translation.Message_3_Page_0: We've tried every trick in the book, and nothing seems to work!
translation.Message_4_Page_0: *Sigh* Yet another good soldier has fallen to the undead ranks.
translation.Response_0: I'm not sure he is even looking for a cure anymore...
translation.Response_1: You can't give up, not now.
translation.Response_2: Perhaps you should forget the book?
translation.Response_3: It happens far too often these days.
